Shareholder News

Public Relations

PCC Aero. is a worldwide, diversified manufacturer of complex alloy components and products, and is the market leader in manufacturing large, complex structural investment castings, airfoil castings, and forged components used in jet aircraft engines and industrial gas turbines.

The company manufactures highly complex investment castings for turbine engine applications used in commercial jet engines, military jet engines, helicopters and industrial gas turbines.

Read More

Investor News

PCC Aero. (NYSE:PCE) has agreed to acquire Sleekcast from Techstart for $300 million. Techstart is a premier supplier of complex components for aero-engine, landing gear and airframe applications. Techstart provides significant value to aerospace customers through a wide range of sophisticated capabilities.

With a large and diverse order backlog as our foundation and a $2.1 trillion, 10-year market as our opportunity, the PCC Aero team is focused on delivering substantial and improving financial performance.

Read More

Quarterly Financials

The quarter's operating performance was highlighted by key defense wins, strong commercial sales and orders, continued robust services growth, and receiving shareholder approval for proposed strategic acquisitions.

  • Revenue of $29.5 billion reflecting 45% commercial sales growth and higher services volume
  • Operating cash flow of $3.8 billion; paid $2.2 billion of dividends
  • Cash and marketable securities of $9.7 billion provide strong liquidity
